autumn_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: Wait, what’s this? You dare summon me while I am eating?$(n)$(n)How rude! There had better be a good reason for this! If my food is cold when I get back, we’re going to have some choice words!
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_01.complete.d: Wow, that was delicious! Not even our chefs are that good. You said that last meal was prepared by Chef Shaun? Please, give him my thanks!$(n)$(n)Listen, I would really like to help you, but despite the truce, our realm was recently attacked by the Cult of the Void. Our people aren't very trusting at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_01.start.desc: Oh, what’s that? You have some fishsticks in your pocket that you’re willing to give me?$(n)$(n)Well, I guess you seem like a good person.$(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Give the Pixie 5 Fish Sticks.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_02.complete.d: What an excellent workout. Thank you, I got the level I was hoping for.$(n)$(n)$(i)You hear a low grumbling noise coming from the pixies stomach.$(r)
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_02.start.desc: You're after the Cult of the Void as well?$(n)$(n)Why don't we go fight some monsters together to see how we pair? I am really close to leveling up. Do you think we could go kill a few zombies? I'll analyze your fighting style so I can report back to Queen Titania.$(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Acquire 20 Rotten Flesh
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_03.complete.d: That tastes even better than the fish sticks! I sure could get used to this.. We lost a lot of our crops during the initial attack from that darn cult.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_03.start.desc: Ummm, I really hate to ask, but all that fighting took a lot out of me.$(n)$(n)Do you think that Chef Shaun would make me something to eat? I think some chicken tenders would really get my strength back.$(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Give the pixie 5 Chicken Tenders.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_04.complete.d: The pixie asks you to look the other way.$(n)$(n)$(i)You hear some grunting, followed by a magical swirling sound.$(r)$(n)$(n)Okay, here is the Concentrated Pixie Essence.$(n)$(n)With that, and your Manyullyn Ingots, we just need a few more things to make the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_04.start.desc: I've spoken with Queen Titania, and she’s willing to grant you an audience.$(n)$(n)If you want to travel to Feywild, you will need to get: 3 Manyullyn Ingots, 1 Witherite Ingot, 1 Sandstorm in a Bottle, and uh... um... 4 Concentrated Pixie Essence...$(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Make 3 Manyullyn Ingots
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_05.complete.d: Wow, you're really strong! Hopefully Queen Titania sees what I see and chooses to ally with you.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_05.start.desc: I think we should try to fight the Ancient Remnant first and get the Sandstorm in a Bottle.$(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Obtain a Sandstorm in a Bottle.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_06.complete.d: That was NOT easy.$(n)$(n)I am completely out of breath and all I did was just float here.$(n)$(n)That's it though. You have all the materials now! Let's get back and make the Orb.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_06.start.desc: Now we just need to get a Witherite Ingot from the Harbinger, and we should have all the materials we need to get you to Feywild!$(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Acquire a Witherite Ingot.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_07.complete.d: The orb is fully attuned. All you have to do is use it!$(n)$(n)You can also take this Pixie Wing Tiara, which will let you make your own pixie wings.$(n)$(n)They are gonna look so good on you!
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_07.start.desc: Go ahead and craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.$(n)$(n)I will attune it to Feywild once you’ve completed the craft. Then you can travel freely to our realm.$(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_08.complete.d: I bet they are gonna look great on you! Hurry up and try them on!
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_08.start.desc: Hey, friend. It's time to make your Pixie Wings. You can craft your own on the Fey Altar!$(n)$(n)You probably have most of what you need, but you may need to mine around in Feywild for a bit to get enough Fey Gem.$(n)$(n)$(autumn)Objective: $()Craft the Pixie Wings.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_09.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_09.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_09.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_10.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_10.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_10.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_11.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_11.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_11.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_12.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_12.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.autumn.quest_12.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.autumn.root.start.descript: Wait, what’s this? You dare summon me while I am eating? How rude! There had better be a good reason for this! If my food is cold when I get back, we’re going to have some choice words! You better have something good to say, or something delicious to eat!$(n)$(n)$(b;autumn)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Autumn Court!$()
quest.feywild.autumn.root.start.title: Interrupted Meal
quest.feywild.spring.quest_01.complete.d: Thank you! To be honest, my old one only had 2 durability left.$(n)$(n)$(i)The pixie cackles maniacally$(r)$(n)$(n)Sorry about that, I do appreciate it, though.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_01.start.desc: Do you have the Diamond Hoe, yet? $(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Give the pixie a Diamond Hoe
quest.feywild.spring.quest_02.complete.d: This is wonderful. The seeds will soon be singing the germination song!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_02.start.desc: Now that I have a new hoe, we sure could use some seeds and fertilizer. If you're feeling generous, that would really help us.$(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Give the pixie 10 seeds, and 10 Mystical Fertilizer
quest.feywild.spring.quest_03.complete.d: Wow, that's amazing. Supremium Farmland?! You sure are an incredible, friend!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_03.start.desc: With how much you've done already, I hate to ask for more.$(n)$(n)We are trying to restore another plot of land, but unfortunately, the ground is completely dead. Think you could help us out with some farmland blocks?$(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Give the pixie 10 Supremium Farmland
quest.feywild.spring.quest_04.complete.d: With the Concentrated Pixie Dust that you just received, and those Manyullyn Ingots, all that's left is to defeat the Harbinger and Ancient Remnant.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_04.start.desc: You’ve shown me such kindness, and Queen Mab is requesting an audience.$(n)$(n)Unfortunately, to get into Feywild you will need some hard to get items. You'll need 1 Witherite Ingot, 1 Sandstorm in a Bottle, 3 Manyullyn Ingots, and.. oh.. um.. would you excuse me for just one moment?$(n)$(n)$(i)The pixie wanders behind the building where you see a flash of glowing light$(r)$(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Make 3 Manyullyn Ingots
quest.feywild.spring.quest_05.complete.d: Wow, you're really strong! Hopefully Queen Mab sees what I see and chooses to ally with you.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_05.start.desc: I think we should try to fight the Ancient Remnant first and get the Sandstorm in a Bottle.$(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Obtain a Sandstorm in a Bottle.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_06.complete.d: That was NOT easy.$(n)$(n)I am completely out of breath and all I did was just float here.$(n)$(n)That's it though. You have all the materials now! Let's get back and make the Orb.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_06.start.desc: Now we just need to get a Witherite Ingot from the Harbinger, and we should have all the materials we need to get you to Feywild!$(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Acquire a Witherite Ingot.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_07.complete.d: The orb is fully attuned. All you have to do is use it!$(n)$(n)You can also take this Pixie Wing Tiara, which will let you make your own pixie wings.$(n)$(n)They are gonna look so good on you!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_07.start.desc: Go ahead and craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.$(n)$(n)I will attune it to Feywild once you’ve completed the craft. Then you can travel freely to our realm.$(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_08.complete.d: I bet they are gonna look great on you! Hurry up and try them on!
quest.feywild.spring.quest_08.start.desc: Hey, friend. It's time to make your Pixie Wings. You can craft your own on the Fey Altar!$(n)$(n)You probably have most of what you need, but you may need to mine around in Feywild for a bit to get enough Fey Gem.$(n)$(n)$(spring)Objective: $()Craft the Pixie Wings.

quest.feywild.spring.quest_09.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_09.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You

quest.feywild.spring.quest_20.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.spring.quest_20.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.spring.root.start.descript: Oh my! That summon was quite sudden! I was tending my sprouts, You must need my help? Luckily, Queen Mab and Titania have called a truce because the Cult of the Void is ruining our lands. I'll hear you out, but you need to replace this Diamond Hoe you broke, first!$(n)$(n)$(b;spring)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Spring Court!$()
quest.feywild.spring.root.start.title: Interrupted Gardening
quest.feywild.summer.quest_01.complete.d: $(i)The pixie lets the refried beans drop to the floor and smites them.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_01.start.desc: Gosh, who even carries beans in their pocket? You’re a monster!$(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Give the pixie the Refried Beans.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_02.complete.d: Thanks! Now it fits even better than before.$(n)$(n)Maybe we should try to go fight something so I can break in the new armor!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_02.start.desc: Hey, so... when you summoned me, my armor got damaged in transport.$(n)$(n)Could you bring me a Tertium Gemstone so I can fix it? Then maybe we can talk about the Cult of the Void.$(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Give the pixie a Tertium Gemstone.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_03.complete.d: Those look a bit too squishy. I don't think I want to touch them.$(n)$(n)Why don't you keep them?
quest.feywild.summer.quest_03.start.desc: I think I saw a few creepy spiders off in that other direction over there.$(n)$(n)Let's go beat them up and we can discuss your plans for an alliance.$(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Obtain 15 Spider Eyes.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_04.complete.d: Would you turn around for a moment?$(n)$(n)$(i)You hear the pixie mumbling and then a magical swirling sound.$(r)Here, take this.. I cannot BELIEVE I had to make more of that stuff..$(n)$(n)With the essence, and your Manyullyn Ingots, we just need to go defeat some bosses to get the rest!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_04.start.desc: I let Queen Titania know you helped me, and about your fight with the Cult of the Void. She wants to meet you!$(n)$(n)We need some items to get you into Feywild. You will need 3 Manyullyn Ingots, 1 Witherite Ingot, 1 Sandstorm in a Bottle, and 4 Concentrated Pixie Essence.$(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Make 3 Manyullyn Ingots.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_05.complete.d: Wow, you're really strong! Hopefully Queen Titania sees what I see and chooses to ally with you.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_05.start.desc: I think we should try to fight the Ancient Remnant first and get the Sandstorm in a Bottle.$(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Obtain a Sandstorm in a Bottle.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_06.complete.d: That was NOT easy.$(n)$(n)I am completely out of breath and all I did was just float here.$(n)$(n)That's it though. You have all the materials now! Let’s get back and make the Orb.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_06.start.desc: Now we just need to get a Witherite Ingot from the Harbinger, and we should have all the materials we need to get you to Feywild!$(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Acquire a Witherite Ingot.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_07.complete.d: The orb is fully attuned. All you have to do is use it!$(n)$(n)You can also take this Pixie Wing Tiara, which will let you make your own pixie wings.$(n)$(n)They are gonna look so good on you!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_07.start.desc: Go ahead and craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.$(n)$(n)I will attune it to Feywild once you’ve completed the craft. Then you can travel freely to our realm.$(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_08.complete.d: I bet they are gonna look great on you! Hurry up and try them on!
quest.feywild.summer.quest_08.start.desc: Hey, friend. It's time to make your Pixie Wings. You can craft your own on the Fey Altar!$(n)$(n)You probably have most of what you need, but you may need to mine around in Feywild for a bit to get enough Fey Gem.$(n)$(n)$(summer)Objective: $()Craft the Pixie Wings.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_09.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_09.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_09.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.summer.quest_10.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_10.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_10.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.summer.quest_11.complete.d: Did you cheat to pass this quest? You naughty little cheater.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_11.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.summer.quest_11.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
quest.feywild.summer.root.start.descript: Huh, what...? Where am I? Who are you? You’d better have a good reason or I’ll curse your crops!$(n)$(n)I'm kidding! Don’t bring out the refried beans! I’m allergic! Just hand them over so I can dispose of them.$(n)$(n)$(b;summer)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Summer Court!$()
quest.feywild.summer.root.start.title: The Summer of Beans
quest.feywild.winter.root.start.descript: Are you serious? You summon me here? In the middle of my own business?! Unbelievable! Mortals have no sense of timing. If you're going to interrupt my day, at least make yourself useful and bring me something to clean myself.$(n)$(n)$(b;winter)Accepting this quest will bind you to the Winter Court!$()
quest.feywild.winter.root.start.title: Bad Timing
quest.feywild.winter.quest_01.complete.d: Three Seashells? Really?! I didn't realize your people were so classy! I think we're going to get along just fine.$(n)$(n)Tell me, what made you summon me to this realm?
quest.feywild.winter.quest_01.start.desc: Well? I'm waiting!$(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Give the Pixie the Three Seashells.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_02.complete.d: Oh, this is perfect. We can start regrowing our fields now!
quest.feywild.winter.quest_02.start.desc: The Cult of the Void? I see... We were recently attacked by them as well. Queen Mab and Queen Titania even called for a temporary truce while they clean the lands of Corruption.$(n)$(n)Unfortunately, it's left our crop supply short. Think you could spare some seeds?$(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Give the pixie 10 seeds.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_03.complete.d: That sure was delicious. I even shared some with Queen Mab and our court. She says that if you're willing to bring more delicacies like that, she will grant you an audience to discuss a potential alliance to take on the Cult of the Void.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_03.start.desc: We've started growing the fields again and look forward to our first hot meal in weeks.$(n)$(n)What? You have some food you would like to share with us?$(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Give the Pixie 10 of any soup.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_04.complete.d: I will be right back.$(n)The pixie blushes, hides behind a barrel as you hear magical swirling sounds, and a glowing light$(r)$(n)$(n)With that Concentrated Pixie Essence I gave you, and the 3 Manyullyn Ingots you made, all you need now is something from an Ancient Remnant and the Harbinger.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_04.start.desc: To get into Feywild, you’re going to need some Concentrated Pixie Essences, as well as 1 Witherite Ingot, 1 Sandstorm in a Bottle, and 3 Manyullyn Ingots.$(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Make 3 Manyullyn Ingots.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_05.complete.d: Wow, you're really strong! Hopefully Queen Mab sees what I see and chooses to ally with you.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_05.start.desc: I think we should try to fight the Ancient Remnant first and get the Sandstorm in a Bottle.$(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Obtain a Sandstorm in a Bottle.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_06.complete.d: That was NOT easy.$(n)$(n)I am completely out of breath and all I did was just float here.$(n)$(n)That's it though. You have all the materials now! Let's get back and make the Orb.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_06.start.desc: Now we just need to get a Witherite Ingot from the Harbinger, and we should have all the materials we need to get you to Feywild!$(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Acquire a Witherite Ingot.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_07.complete.d: The orb is fully attuned. All you have to do is use it!$(n)$(n)You can also take this Pixie Wing Tiara, which will let you make your own pixie wings.$(n)$(n)They are gonna look so good on you!
quest.feywild.winter.quest_07.start.desc: Go ahead and craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.$(n)$(n)I will attune it to Feywild once you’ve completed the craft. Then you can travel freely to our realm.$(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Craft the Teleportation Orb: Feywild.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_08.complete.d: I bet they are gonna look great on you! Hurry up and try them on!
quest.feywild.winter.quest_08.start.desc: Hey, friend. It's time to make your Pixie Wings. You can craft your own on the Fey Altar!$(n)$(n)You probably have most of what you need, but you may need to mine around in Feywild for a bit to get enough Fey Gem.$(n)$(n)$(winter)Objective: $()Craft the Pixie Wings.

quest.feywild.winter.quest_09.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_09.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You

quest.feywild.winter.quest_10.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_10.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You

quest.feywild.winter.quest_11.start.desc: Hey friend! I don't have anything for you at this time.
quest.feywild.winter.quest_11.start.titl: I Don't Have Anything For You
spring_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: Where am I? Who are you? Are you tasty? Let's go on an adventure! You wanna play? ...I'm hungry!
summer_quest_pixie.feywild.summon_messag: How dare you summon me like I am some sort of magician’s pet! You’d better know your place... Hmph!
